actor_awards.notes: An iconic figure of the Spaghetti Western genre, known for his sharp features and piercing eyes. He rose to international fame playing the 'Bad' in Sergio Leone's 'The Good, the Bad and the Ugly'.

filmography.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
filmography.role_description: A ruthless, sadistic mercenary and hitman who will stop at nothing to find a buried fortune in Confederate gold.
filmography.plot: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

filmography.title: For a Few Dollars More
filmography.role_description: A sophisticated, revenge-seeking bounty hunter who teams up with a stranger to hunt down a ruthless bandit.
filmography.plot: Two bounty hunters with the same intentions team up to track down a Western outlaw.

filmography.title: High Noon
filmography.role_description: A silent, menacing member of Frank Miller's gang waiting at the train station. Van Cleef's film debut.
filmography.plot: A town Marshal, despite the disagreements of his newlywed bride and the townspeople around him, must face a gang of deadly killers alone at high noon.

filmography.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
filmography.role_description: A sadistic henchman working for the notorious outlaw Liberty Valance.
filmography.plot: A senator returns to a western town for the funeral of an old friend and tells the truth about his deed.

filmography.title: Escape from New York
filmography.role_description: The Police Commissioner who recruits Snake Plissken to rescue the President from the prison island of Manhattan.
filmography.plot: In 1997, when the U.S. president crashes into Manhattan, now a giant maximum security prison, a convicted bank robber is sent in to rescue him.

filmography.title: The Big Gundown
filmography.role_description: A famous lawman and bounty hunter who pursues a Mexican peasant accused of raping a 12-year-old girl.
filmography.plot: A lawman pursues a Mexican peasant accused of a crime he didn't commit, eventually uncovering a political conspiracy.

filmography.title: Death Rides a Horse
filmography.role_description: An aging outlaw who mentors a young man seeking revenge against the gang that killed his family.
filmography.plot: A young man, who witnessed the murder of his family as a child, teams up with an aging outlaw to hunt down the killers.

filmography.title: Kansas City Confidential
filmography.role_description: A womanizing getaway driver involved in a perfectly planned armored car heist.
filmography.plot: An ex-con trying to go straight is framed for a million dollar armored car robbery and must find the real criminals to clear his name.

filmography.title: Day of Anger
filmography.role_description: An aging gunfighter who takes a young, ridiculed town sweeper under his wing, teaching him the ways of the gun.
filmography.plot: A street cleaner is mentored by a master gunfighter, but their relationship turns into a deadly rivalry when the student surpasses the teacher.

filmography.title: Ride Lonesome
filmography.role_description: An outlaw who clashes with a bounty hunter over a prisoner in this classic Budd Boetticher western.
filmography.plot: A bounty hunter trying to bring a murderer to justice is forced to contend with two outlaws who want the bounty for themselves.

filmography.title: The Big Combo
filmography.role_description: A cold-blooded hitman part of a duo with Earl Holliman, executing orders for a crime boss.
filmography.plot: A police lieutenant is ordered to stop his investigation of a crime boss, but he continues his obsession with the case.

filmography.title: The Tin Star
filmography.role_description: A gunman in a town where a veteran bounty hunter teaches a young sheriff the ropes.
filmography.plot: An experienced bounty hunter helps a young, inexperienced sheriff dealing with outlaws in his town.

filmography.title: Gunfight at the O.K. Corral
filmography.role_description: A gunman who attempts to ambush Doc Holliday early in the film.
filmography.plot: Lawman Wyatt Earp and outlaw Doc Holliday form an unlikely alliance which culminates in their participation in the legendary Gunfight at the O.K. Corral.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Sound, Best Film Editing

filmography.title: Sabata
filmography.role_description: A mysterious, gadget-using gunslinger who thwarts a bank robbery plot orchestrated by the town leaders.
filmography.plot: A master gunslinger discovers a bank robbery was an inside job by the town's elite and blackmails them.

filmography.title: How the West Was Won
filmography.role_description: A river pirate who attacks the Prescott family's raft, bearing a resemblance to his character in 'High Noon'.
filmography.plot: A family saga covering several decades of Westward expansion in the 19th century, including the Gold Rush, the Civil War, and the building of the railroads.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Original Screenplay, Best Film Editing, Best Sound

filmography.title: The Bravados
filmography.role_description: One of the four outlaws hunted by Gregory Peck's character for the murder of his wife.
filmography.plot: A rancher hunts down the four outlaws who he believes raped and murdered his wife.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Win – Best Supporting Actor (Albert Salmi)

filmography.title: The Young Lions
filmography.role_description: A tough army sergeant training Montgomery Clift's character.
filmography.plot: The destiny of three soldiers during World War II: a German officer, and two Americans.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Cinematography, Best Sound, Best Music

filmography.title: The Grand Duel
filmography.role_description: An ex-sheriff who tries to protect a man wrongly accused of murder from a vengeful family.
filmography.plot: A veteran lawman helps a man framed for murder to prove his innocence and confront the powerful brothers who framed him.

filmography.title: Tribute to a Bad Man
filmography.role_description: A rustler who crosses the path of a harsh horse rancher played by James Cagney.
filmography.plot: A wealthy rancher who has his own way of dispensing justice finds his authority challenged by a new ranch hand and his own mistress.

filmography.title: Barquero
filmography.role_description: A barge operator who refuses to ferry a gang of outlaws across the river, leading to a standoff.
filmography.plot: A barge operator refuses to be bullied by a gang of outlaws who need his boat to escape with their loot.

filmography.title: Return of Sabata
filmography.role_description: Van Cleef returns as the trick-shot artist to fight a corrupt family imposing heavy taxes.
filmography.plot: Master gunslinger Sabata returns to Hobsonville to confront a family of swindlers who are taxing the townspeople.

filmography.title: Captain Apache
filmography.role_description: A Native American Union officer investigating a murder and a conspiracy.
filmography.plot: A Native American US Army officer investigates the murder of an Indian Commissioner and uncovers a plot involving a mysterious phrase 'April Morning'.

filmography.title: El Condor
filmography.role_description: A drunken prospector who teams up with an escaped convict to steal gold from a Mexican fortress.
filmography.plot: An escaped convict and a prospector team up to storm a Mexican fortress said to contain a fortune in gold.

filmography.title: It Conquered the World
filmography.role_description: A disillusioned scientist who helps a Venusian alien invade Earth, believing it will save humanity.
filmography.plot: A scientist guides an alien monster to Earth from Venus to purge the world of human emotion, but realizes too late the creature's evil intent.

filmography.title: The Beast from 20,000 Fathoms
filmography.role_description: An army sharpshooter who plays a critical role in the finale against the Rhedosaurus.
filmography.plot: A ferocious dinosaur awakened by an Arctic atomic test terrorizes the North Atlantic and eventually New York City.

filmography.title: Vice Squad
filmography.role_description: A gangster involved in a bank heist and police manhunt in this noir procedural.
filmography.plot: A police captain uses every trick in the book to catch a cop-killing bank robber.

filmography.title: Beyond the Law
filmography.role_description: A thief who becomes a sheriff to steal a shipment of silver but finds himself conflicted.
filmography.plot: A bandit helps a European prince transport a shipment of silver, planning to steal it, but begins to enjoy the role of a lawman.
